Scenario1-Validating_with_PersonId.TC-1: GIVEN Valid PersonId And EnrolleeID WHEN requesting to Validate THEN should Return Status Code As 200

Scenario2-Validating_with_InValid_Person.TC-1: GIVEN InValid PersonId And Valid EnrolleeID WHEN requesting to Validate THEN should Return Status Code As 200

Scenario3-Validating_with_InValid_Enroll.TC-1: GIVEN Valid PersonId And InValid EnrolleeID WHEN requesting to Validate THEN should Return Status Code As 200
